scripts.cy:run:chrome: npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/Chrome/test-chrome.cy.js' --browser chrome --record --key c0d65006-44bd-4c36-a4ce-4d409e4e5c43 --config-file cypress.config.js
scripts.run:test: npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/test-chrome.cy.js' --browser chrome && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/test-electron.cy.js' --browser electron
scripts.run:test:dashboard: npx cypress run --record --key c0d65006-44bd-4c36-a4ce-4d409e4e5c43 --spec 'cypress/e2e/Chrome/test-chrome.cy.js' --browser chrome && npx cypress run --record --key c0d65006-44bd-4c36-a4ce-4d409e4e5c43 --spec 'cypress/e2e/Electron/test-electron.cy.js' --browser electron
scripts.cy:nokey:parallel: npm run cy:run:chrome -- --browser chrome & npm run cy:run:electron -- --browser electron
scripts.cy:parallel: concurrently "npm run cy:run:chrome -- --browser chrome --group chrome" "npm run cy:run:electron -- --browser electron --group electron"
scripts.cy:report: npx cypress run && allure generate --clean && allure open
